title: Fire Patch 2014 version 3.0 AIO - PRO EVOLUTION SOCCER 2014
description:
Fire Patch 2014 version 3.0 AIO

Fire Patch Team:
- Steven
- Archero
- Nikola11

All Features:
- Added new World Cup 2014 kits for some national teams
- Added newest boots (Total 101 Boots in Fire Patch 2014 v3.0)
- Added more 1000+ real faces with high quality.
- Added Sponsors for some club teams (Celtic, Torino, Catania, AS Roma, Hellas Verona, Leverkusen...)
- Includes PES 2014 Patch 1.01, 1.06 & 1.07 and Data Pack 3.00.
- Full License for 20 EPL, 18 SkyBET Championship & 18 Bundesliga teams (kits, team names, squads, stats, logo)
- Added new stadiums (total 36 stadiums in game)
- Update winter transfer
- Added more kits for unlicensed teams.
- Correct players for all National teams.
- Added new kits: Ireland, Norway, Montenegro, Burkina Faso, Guinea, Mali, Senegal, Morrocco, Tunisia, Zambia, Honduras, Panama, Senegal, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Gil Vicente.
- New National Teams: Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore (You can play ML with correct nationality) (Added, not replace).
- Added New teams: UEFA Champion League Final (2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2009, 2008, 2007, 2006, 2005), Anzhi Makhachkala, FenerbahÃƒÂ§e, Dynamo Kyiv, Spartak Moscow, Rubin Kazan, KRC Genk, Redbull Salzburg, Austria Wien, Steaua Bucuresti, Viktoria Plzen, FC Basel, Trabzonspor, FC Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk, Esbjerg fB, FC Slovan Liberec, FC Chornomorets Odesa, NK Maribor, PFC Ludogorets Razgrad, GNK Dinamo Zagreb, HNK Hajduk Split, HNK Rijeka, FK Ã…Â½eljezniÃ„ï¿½ar Sarajevo, FK Sarajevo, FK Partizan, Fk Crvena Zvezda Beograd, SK Rapid Wien, Standard LiÃƒÂ¨ge, Sheriff, FC Thun, Maccabi Haifa, Kuban Krasnoda, Pandurii Targu Jiu, IF Elfsborg, Zulte-Waregem
- Added Champion League kits for Chelsea, Arsenal, Barcelona, Atletico Madrid, Dortmund, Manchester United.
- Correct players for all National teams & Classic teams.
- Fixed lineups for many teams.
- Added new balls.
- Relink boots for all famous players
